short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sort Tabs Alphabetically. Easily organize your open tabs in the browser window. Ideal for heavy tab users!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you find yourself constantly juggling a large number of tabs in your web browser? Keeping track of everything can be a real challenge, especially when your tabs are disorganized and difficult to navigate. That's why I developed a powerful new Chrome extension tool that can help you take control of your browsing experience.

    With this tool, you'll be able to easily sort all of your currently opened tabs in your browser window alphabetically. This can be a huge timesaver, allowing you to quickly find the tab you need and get back to work without delay. And because it's a browser extension, it's always available to use whenever you need it, without any additional software or downloads.
    
    Whether you're a busy professional, a student, or just someone who loves to surf the web, this Chrome extension can help you stay organized and productive. With its intuitive interface and powerful sorting capabilities, it's a must-have tool for anyone who wants to get the most out of their web browsing experience. So why wait? Download it today and start enjoying a more organized, efficient web experience!
